subject: Organized Labor
Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants co-owner John Mara said he was resigned to an uncapped season in 2010 and believes the union and owners might be moving further apart in talks toward a new labor agreement.
snippet: The Giants co-owner John Mara said he was resigned to an uncapped season in 2010 and believes the union and owners might be moving further apart in talks toward a new labor agreement.
